LanguageData.WallFlameTurret.label: wall flame turret
LanguageData.WallFlameTurret.description: A couple of canisters full of chemfuel strapped to a wall turret, with an added torch at the end of the barrel to ignite the chemfuel coated bullets. It's also been given a red paintjob to show the change. It uses more materials to protect it from being blown up when a bullet hits it.
LanguageData.FIRE.label: fire
LanguageData.Gun_WallTurretFlame.label: Wall Flame turret
LanguageData.Gun_WallTurretFlame.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a wall turret.
